archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.2.8b: b) specific security-related topics, such as those detailed in industry/international information security-related standards (e.g. ISF SOGP, ISO 27002 or the NIST Cyber Security Framework), determined by the organisation as being necessary for the effective implementation of the information security programme.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
